thread.title: Rangoon Movie Promotion: Saif Ali Khan And Kangana Ranaut Next On Koffee With Karan Show - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Rangoon Movie Promotion: Saif Ali Khan And Kangana Ranaut Next On Koffee With Karan Show - Indiatimes.com

title: Rangoon Movie Promotion: Saif Ali Khan And Kangana Ranaut Next On Koffee With Karan Show - Indiatimes.com
text:
February 01, 2017 273 SHARES 
Saif Ali Khan is one of the veterans of Karan Johar's popular chat show, Koffee With Karan . He has attended almost all the seasons. From making an appearance with his co-star Preity Zinta to appearing on the show with Kareena twice, Saif's 'Koffee' journey has been quite entertaining. 
And now an Indian express report claims that Saif Ali Khan will make his appearance with his Rangoon co-star Kangana Ranaut. The report also claims that both the stars will be shooting for their episode on 3 February, while the episode will be aired a week prior to the release of Rangoon . 
But here's what most of us are wondering - why isn't Shahid a part of the episode? According to reports, this could have to do with the fact that things aren't all that great between Kangana and Shahid. A photo posted by Manish Swarnkar (@mnis007) on Jan 29, 2017 at 7:50pm PST Be that as it may, we can't wait to watch the episode! Don't Miss
